description: Some say the journey is more important than the destination. Maybe they’ve never been to the mountains. With a blend of ZQ-certified Merino and recycled polyester that teams up with flatlock, anti-chafing seams, this men’s short-sleeved tee is made for your comfort. And its iconic mountain image overlaid with a compass rosette can remind you of your favorite destination—even when you’re not there.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Mountain Journey Graphic Tee - Mens
